remarks: Scalar product for the closed kernel vector space dual.  (Contributed by NM, 28-Mar-2015.)
statement:
lcdvs.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lcdvs.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdvs.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` U ) $.
lcdvs.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` D ) $.
lcdvs.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdvs.m $e |- .xb = ( .s ` C ) $.
lcdvs.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
lcdvs $p |- ( ph -> .xb = .x. ) $.
